# üßë‚Äçüíª Personal Portfolio Website

Welcome to my **developer portfolio** ‚Äî a fully responsive and dynamic website built using **Django**, **Tailwind CSS**, and **PostgreSQL**. It showcases my skills, projects, certifications, and contact form connected to a real database.

---

## üîó Live Demo

üåê [Visit My Portfolio](https://portfolio-h2qi.onrender.com)

## üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack

- ‚öôÔ∏è **Backend**: Django (Python), PostgreSQL
- üé® **Frontend**: Tailwind CSS, HTML5, JS
- üóÑÔ∏è **Database**: PostgreSQL
- ‚òÅÔ∏è **Deployment**: Render / Netlify / GitHub Pages (choose your host)
